articles.title: 9/11 attacks still reverberate as US marks 21st anniversary - The Associated Press
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Americans remembered 9/11 on Sunday with tear-choked tributes and pleas to “never forget," 21 years after the deadliest terror attack on U.S. soil. Nikita Shah headed to the ceremony at ground in a T-shirt that bore the de facto epigraph of th…
